extension.name: Favourite
extension.author: FavThemes
extension.description:
Favourite is a responsive Joomla! template, a smart template that adapts and resizes itself to desktop and mobile devices. It was built with HTML5 and CSS3 and has an extensive set of parameters for easy and fast customization to suit your clientsâ€™ needs as quickly as possible.

Did we mention is a completely FREE responsive Joomla! template, licensed under GNU/GPL3? So feel free to use it in your projects and design awesome responsive websites!
